review: The UI is terrible. Very clunky and it feels unorganized. It also seemed slow in responsiveness to my remote clicks. I want to love this product. But the UI makes it very hard. I'm going to go back to using my other streaming devices.
author: Andrew Budziszek

review: I got Amazon Prime along with the Fire TV Stick. It seems that to get the most out of the Fire Stick you need Prime also. I tried the Fire Stick on the TV in my bedroom and it says that the wifi connection is week or it will turn off. When I use it on the TV in my living room it works fine. I don't know if it's a problem with the stick, my TV, or my connection. Overall though, I think it's a good product and I enjoy using it.
author: Ramon Ibarra
